name: Atlas Air 747-4U7F [N408MC] Landing and Close Up Taxi in Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
What a massive aircraft! This was quite a nice surprise to get an Atlas Air 747 in daylight, since these usually come at night. Unfortunately, C-FRAM, operating as AC844 to Frankfurt, decided to photobomb the approach shot. As you will see in the video, right after landing, I moved to an area near the cargo buildings to see it taxi extremely close up. I have never seen an aircraft that large taxi that close to me. I couldn`t fit the whole plane in the frame, it was that close. So, I hope you guys enjoy the video as much as I did filming it!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Atlas Air (GTI/5Y)
Aircraft: Boeing 747-400F
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: "ANA Aviation Services - Astral Aviation"
Engines: 4x GE CF6-80C2B5F
Registration: N408MC
Route: ORD-YYC
Callsign: Giant 654 Heavy
Runway used: 35R
Taxiway(s) used: D1, D2, then A, backtrack RW 9/27
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/N408MC
